ygData.subject: Re: ARK
ygData.msgSnippet: Bronco continued to claw at Fliq. With his last ounce of strength, FLiq grabbed his head and made sure he was looking directly into this eyes. Brix! Stop it!

Bronco continued to claw at Fliq. With his last ounce of strength, 
FLiq grabbed his head and made sure he was looking directly into this 
eyes.

"Brix! Stop it! I know you're in their! The battle is over! Come back 
to us."

Slw the grib on Fliq relaxed, and than the blue eyes of Brix retured.

"Oh Fliq! I'm so sorry! We have to get you to a CR Chamber!

Brix carries Fliq inside what was left of the Ark. When he coems 
across the CR Chambers, only one is left intact, and it is low on 
power.

"Well Fiq, this is the best I can do," said Brix as he placed Fliq in 
the final CR Chamber, "I'll fix them all soon. Right now I need to 
see what's going on."

Brix heads back out to find two Maximals(Striker and Hot Rod) 
talking. He goes up to them.

"Hi! My name's Brix. I got here just in time for battle, so what's 
going on, and what are we going to do about it?"
